description.value: This section contains the main top level resources that are used in a Breast Radiology Report.
This section contains resources that are commonly used throughout a Breast Radiology Report
This section contains value sets that are commonly used throughout a Breast Radiology Report
This section contains code systems that are commonly used throughout a Breast Radiology Report
This section contains resources used specifically in a Mammography exam
This section contains value sets used specifically in a Mammography exam
This section contains code systems used specifically in a Mammography exam
This section contains resources used specifically in a MRI exam
This section contains value sets used specifically in a MRI exam
This section contains code systems used specifically in a MRI exam
This section contains resources used specifically in a Ultra-Sound exam
This section contains value sets used specifically in a UltraSound exam
This section contains code systems used specifically in a UltraSound exam
This section contains resources used specifically by AIM
This section contains value sets used specifically by AIM
This section contains code systems used specifically by AIM
This section the fragments that are used to define the resources
Codes defining breast body location angles expressed in clock-face units.
Breast body location depth code system.
Breast body location quadrant code system.
Breast body location region code system.
Codes defining types of mammography asymmetry abnormalities.
Codes defining types of mammography cyst abnormalities.
Codes defining types of mammography density abnormalities.
Codes defining types of mammography duct abnormalities.
Codes defining types of mammography lymph node abnormalities.
Codes for mammography breast density values.
Ultra-sound mass echo pattern code system.
Ultra-sound mass Posterior acoustic features code system.
Ultra-sound breast tissue composition code system.
Foreign object codes defining types of foreign objects observed during a Breast Radiology exam
Codes defining types of observed changes in definition of an abnormality over time.
Codes defining types of observed changes in number of an abnormality over time.
Codes defining types of observed changes in Prominance of an abnormality over time.
Codes defining types of observed changes in the size of an abnormality over time.
Codes defining types of observed changes in state of an abnormality over time.
